description: This repository contains the code for our paper "On the Effects of Data Sampling for Deep Learning on Highly Imbalanced Data from SCADA PowerGrid Substation Networks for Intrusion Detection".
title: muehlburger/qrs21-dl-anomaly-detection-scada: Final code for QRS 2021

creators.affiliation: Graz University of Technology - Institute for Software Technology
creators.name: Franz Wotawa and Herbert Mühlburger
